ygData.subject: RE: Carillion song (was  Bard only equipment, a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve gone from apprehensive to dubious in high pass by doing a lot of good quests in Qeynos.  Many of them lower the Carson McCabe faction of the guards. ...
ygData.messageBody:
I've gone from apprehensive to dubious in high pass by doing a lot of 'good'
quests in Qeynos. Many of them lower the Carson McCabe faction of the
guards.

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 2:32 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Carillion song (was Bard only equipment, a rant)


From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>

Just wondering what race/class Tszaaz is? I wouldn't think any wood elf,
human, or half elf bard would have to worry about being KOS in Highpass?
Did you do something in Highpass to hurt your faction?

Galtin of E'ci

> *laughs* oh that is EXACTLY what I am saying...um, or not. I am willing to
> bet you couldn't charisma them out of KoS. it took a lot of gnoll killing
> before I could get the Highpass guards to like me enough to GIVE them a
> gnoll skin.
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin
>
>
>
